msg: Work around the non-working pthread.h detection on OpenBSD.

author: sascha
msg: Get rid of last relative include path in our Makefiles

author: sascha
msg: * Makefile header is now completely dynamic
* Get rid of LTLIBRARY_SHARED_NAME rule in library.mk
* VPATH does not contain variables anymore
* Remove inclusion of program.mk in support/Makefile.in
(PROGRAM_NAME is empty => breaks Irix and others)
* Call REENTRANCY_FLAGS earlier, so that flags are passed to header checks

author: sascha
msg: Add ap_sigwait() to support old-style sigwait().
